website_summaries.verdict: Popular choice for travelers for its RFID-blocking capabilities and rugged design.
pros: Includes six card slots and two slip pockets, as well as a clear ID window with thumb ejector
Contrast stitching and leather patch logo is stylish yet not overpowering
Comes in an attractive gift box
cons: Made with synthetic materials, so while it looks like real leather, it won’t last as long

customer_reviews.title: Peeling of after a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: Bunch of corners and bendable parts peeling off Is this really leather?? Don’t think so
customer_reviews.author: Julio Juarez

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap wallet
customer_reviews.text: This Columbia wallet is a good decent cheap wallet. It's definitely not as sturdy as say the carhartt wallets, however its still more than good enough. Its real soft and pliable so you'll barely feel it in your pocket. The flip id is always awesome. You can't remove it though and there is no divider in the bill section. It's also not made out of real leather i dont think..on the tag it says coated leather, how much of that is true, I'm not sure. The quality is there though, stitching is really good and it has rfid in it( haven't tested that though). Overall, I'd highly recommend this wallet if you're looking for a no frills comfortable billfold.
customer_reviews.author: J Miller

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend loved
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for my boyfriend who had the same Columbia style wallet from years ago. He is picky about wallets and he said that this one is just as wonderful as the one he has been using for years. The card slots were tight at first but loosened as expected after a little use. A few months of normal everyday use and it is holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: DANGELO R BONECELLI

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My old wallet I had for many years. It took me some time to find one online I might like. Overall I love it. Great quality, great material, description was spot on, shipping was fast, it was exactly what I wanted. The only thing that threw me was the thickness of the wallet. It was a little thicker than I thought and the folding flap inside doesn’t come out. So it stays that thick. My old wallet was a little thinner than this one. 4 stars out of 5. If you are looking to gift a wallet, this would be my choice of a good gift.
customer_reviews.author: RoosterDax

customer_reviews.title: solid wallet
customer_reviews.text: Stuffed it full of cards of various types. no bulging so far. Unlike most wallets, the interior has a neutral color plaid I didn't notice when I ordered. Has no practical value but a nice touch none the less. Nicest wallet I have owned so far. And I am 47.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Dillard Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of pockets, though each pocket is smallish
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like this wallet. It has pockets that are a little tighter than the usual wallet pocket. The construction seems to be very good, although there is one spot in the leather that makes me wonder if it is a second. I'm not sure how to test the RFID aspect of the wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Robbysan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: You can’t beat the price for this wallet. A new wallet is like a new pair of shoes , takes a few days for them to get broken in. This wallet for the price is perfect for me. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Golding

customer_reviews.title: Falsely labeled “1 removable ID window”
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the look and feel of the wallet. I bought it as said it was a slim design and “1 removable ID window”. The ID is actually permanently attached, this is the reason for the 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: pete d.

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: I always have liked Columbia items and this wallet is no exeption. The fabric is great, it fiits perfect in the pocket and has the right size for creidt cards and such.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Cool.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not super picky when it comes to wallets so take that for what it’s worth. It holds my ID, cards and cash like it’s supposed to so I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Preppy

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: I might keep a wallet 10 years, so I wanted a good quality product that could stand up over time. Plus I needed to hold all my cards. Once you flip up the flap, there is room for more cards. This product is high quality and not too large for your pocket. It's a perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: David Girson

customer_reviews.title: Per hubby this wallet is fine
customer_reviews.text: The hubby said that this wallet is just fine. Does what he needs it to. He says it is just a wallet. Lol
customer_reviews.author: MinookaMom

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality craftsmanship. This thing is already falling apart, and I'm back to using my old wallet.
customer_reviews.author: fatkidking

customer_reviews.title: 🍀
customer_reviews.text: Long story short my partner lost his wallet and of course I was responsible for replacing it, as his idea of replacement was literally just sticking cash in his pockets. He is personally very into rather basic brown bifolds. If that is what you like, this wallet is perfect, not super thick, just an overall nice wallet!
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect wallet for my college age son. He loves it! Stylish, simple, and practical.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: If you want to protect your $$$
customer_reviews.text: Given as gift to my pops, best gift ever. Everyone needs this in this day and age. Protection your hard earned money.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mac

customer_reviews.title: Decent product.
customer_reviews.text: Good value if it works as advertised. Had to remove the “Columbia” ad (kept catching on pants.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Just do it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet for my boyfriend because his was old and very worn out. I was nervous because he told me he's tried moving out of his wallet several times and never liked what replaced it. So I tried and he loves it and he's not one to lie and act like he likes a gift when he doesn't lol
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Soucy

customer_reviews.title: Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking. Fits well in pocket can put too much in it till you wear it out a little over all very good wallet I do recommend
customer_reviews.author: Peyton howell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallet, heavy duty and had no problems after a year
customer_reviews.author: Jayme

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift , he loved it
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to a very close friend for Christmas he loved it

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Given as a gift and they liked the wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Deona

customer_reviews.title: great billfold
customer_reviews.text: billfold works great this is my second one first one was wearing out aroud the hem. But I like it well enough to buy it a second time, Just wish it was a little better made
customer_reviews.author: Terry T.

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Love Columbia and I purchased this for my son for Xmas , everything was as described and what a great price !
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Burroughs

customer_reviews.title: Husbands Holiday Gift
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this product. Took a big of wearing in at first since it was new and stiff, but now it’s perfectly worn and he used it every day!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Churchill

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wallet! My husband loved it! Has plenty of room for credit cards and fits in his front pocket!

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is exactly what my husband wanted to replace his old, worn out wallet.
customer_reviews.author: DYoung5418

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The wallet I ordered was fine and held my credit cards. The price was affordable.

customer_reviews.title: Good tough leather wallet
customer_reviews.text: Good wallet for the money. Kinda thick wouldn't recomend sitting on it all day.
customer_reviews.author: terry l.

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for one similar to my Cabelas wallet...this was comes very close and satisfied with the wallet overall.
customer_reviews.author: Markie K Polk

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present, 6 months later it still looks brand new and the boyfriend loves it!!

customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves his new wallet! Super nice quality for a great price!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my son. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: katharine britt

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. You can't go wrong with Columbia. Authentic leather, and soft.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: good god good god good god good god good god good god

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart
customer_reviews.text: Less than 30 days of use. Seams are tearing apart.
customer_reviews.author: lisa prigge

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Nice leather wallet but it didn't have a divider in the bill section.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin P New

customer_reviews.title: looks great.
customer_reviews.text: bought for my fiance and he loves it. Very durable. Columbia has always been durable and affordable. If he's happy I'm happy.

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this wallet. It very sleek and thin.
customer_reviews.author: Gara

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband and he loves it got here a week early which was a bonus 😊

customer_reviews.title: I’m his favorite sister now!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet for my brother for Christmas. He absolutely loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wallet
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, lots of pockets. I bought it for my fiance, he likes it!

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the money
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping the id slot was removable but otherwise a decent wallet. Wish it was a tiny bit smaller.

customer_reviews.text: Nice wallet has enough room for all of my cards
customer_reviews.author: john charles burnham

customer_reviews.title: Quality and price
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift but he said he liked it

customer_reviews.title: I paid 30. 00 dollars plus.. too ...
customer_reviews.text: I paid 30.00 dollars plus ..too long getting it and cheap made.

customer_reviews.title: good qualty

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice replacement
customer_reviews.text: I like this wallet, plenty of pockets I like how the ID holder is a separate easy access flap.

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend loved wallet
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallet it's very nice my boyfriend loved it when I gave it to him as a gift

product_meta.title: Columbia Men's RFID Passcase Wallet
product_meta.description: Columbia products are known for their durability throughout any terrain. Take on any adventure with this toby pass case wallet with rid
feature_bullets: STORAGE CAPACITY: This bifold wallet features 6 card slots, 2 secret slip pockets and 1 removable ID window, It also includes a large bill compartment.
RFID BLOCKING TECHNOLOGY: Keep your credit cards safe and protected from wireless thefts, The RFID lining acts like a blocking shield to keep your data protected.
SLIM DESIGN: Measuring just 3.5”H x 4.5”H this thin wallet fits perfectly in your pocket, Enjoy a clean look every time.
BIFOLD SILHOUETTE: The classic design of this wallet features contrasting stitches on edges and a stitched logo patch on front for a minimalist, yet timeless style.
